statements: SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students WHERE course_name = 'Math';
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade >= 90.00;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE graduation_year = 2022 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, graduation_year FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY student_name ASC, grade DESC
SELECT * FROM students WHERE graduation_year = 2022 AND course_name = 'Mathematics'
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name FROM students WHERE grade < 70 ORDER BY grade ASC
SELECT student_name, course_name, graduation_year FROM students WHERE student_id IN (101, 105, 110)
SELECT course_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students GROUP BY course_name HAVING total_students > 2 ORDER BY total_students DESC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 90;
SELECT * FROM GraduationRates WHERE gradution_year = 2021 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, gradution_year FROM Students JOIN GraduationRates ON Students.student_id = GraduationRates.student_id;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_grade > 80 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, gradution_year FROM Students JOIN GraduationRates ON Students.student_id = GraduationRates.student_id WHERE gradution_year = 2022;
SELECT AVG(student_grade) AS average_grade FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, graduation_status FROM Students JOIN GraduationRates ON Students.student_id = GraduationRates.student_id WHERE graduation_status = 'Graduated';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students ORDER BY student_age DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN student_grades ON students.student_id = student_grades.student_id WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM courses ORDER BY teacher_id ASC;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN student_grades ON students.student_id = student_grades.student_id JOIN courses ON student_grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE student_age < 20;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_age, grade_level, graduation_status FROM students;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE teacher_id = 123;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN student_grades ON students.student_id = student_grades.student_id JOIN courses ON student_grades.course_id = courses.course_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students LEFT JOIN student_grades ON students.student_id = student_grades.student_id LEFT JOIN courses ON student_grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE students.student_age > 18;

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students RIGHT JOIN student_grades ON students.student_id = student_grades.student_id RIGHT JOIN courses ON student_grades.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE courses.course_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses ORDER By course_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE graduation_date IS NULL;
SELECT student_name, graduation_date FROM Students WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC, enrollment_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, graduation_date FROM Students WHERE graduation_date IS NULL;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, overall_performance FROM Students JOIN Reports USING(student_id) WHERE overall_performance = 'Excellent';
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade, instructor_name FROM Students JOIN Grades USING(student_id) JOIN Courses USING(course_id) WHERE grade = 'B';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM Students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT student_name, address FROM Students WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Courses WHERE department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT professor_name, position FROM Professors ORDER BY professor_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM Students;
SELECT course_name, department, credits FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT professor_name, department, position FROM Professors ORDER BY department, professor_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, graduation_status, gpa FROM Students JOIN Reports ON Students.student_id = Reports.student_id WHERE gpa >= 3.5;
